pr_title: [CALCITE-4269] Improvement on enumerable implementation for HOP and SESSION

timeline.message:
[CALCITE-3780] Improve SESSION Table-valued Function.

1. Use ArrayDeque to replace LinkedList for the sake of efficiency.
2. Mark the list as "final".

[CALCITE-4269] Improvements on enumerable implementation for HOP and SESSION. (Rui Wang)

1. Use ArrayDeque to replace LinkedList for the sake of efficiency.
2. Mark the list as "final".

timeline.bodyText: Deque might be slightly better here
